metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3117 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** Duplicate of CVE-2023-3390.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-214.225
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-155-generic - 5.4.0-155.172~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-155-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-155.172~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-155-lowlatency - 5.4.0-155.172~18.04.1
